get.summary: This endpoint provides estimates for all integrated dexes based on profit
get.description: This endpoint retrieves a list of decentralized exchanges (dexes) where the selected pair can be swapped. The list is sorted by profit, so we recommend choosing the first dex in the list.

parameters.name: fromToken
parameters.description: Source token. (Supported values for chainId are 1, 56, 137, 43114, 42161 and 324)

parameters.name: toToken
parameters.description: Destination token. (Supported values for chainId are 1, 56, 137, 43114, 42161 and 324)

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: An amount of ```fromToken``` to be swapped (The decimal of token must be considered in the amount)

parameters.name: networkCoinPrice
parameters.description: The price of the selected network's coin based on USD. __Example: ```price of BNB = 245.82```__

parameters.name: slippage
parameters.description: A slippage constraint (in %) is a safeguard during swaps. It is used to calculate the minimum possible outcome during estimation.

parameters.name: gasPrice
parameters.description: Gas Price based on selected network (The unit is gwei)

parameters.name: filteredDexNames
parameters.description: filters dexes to be searched for an estimation, providing results only from these selected dexes.

404.description: No estimation found for the given pair

get.summary: This endpoint returns the data for a swap transaction
get.description:
This endpoint returns ```from```, ```to```, ```data```, ```value```, and ```gasLimit```, all of which needed for executing a swap transaction  
  
* A dex name must be added to the url. The dex name can be found in estimation e.g ```CrowdSwapV2```, ```Quickswap```

parameters.name: fromToken
parameters.description: Source token. (Supported values for chainId are 1, 56, 137, 43114, 42161 and 324)

parameters.name: toToken
parameters.description: Destination token. (Supported values for chainId are 1, 56, 137, 43114, 42161 and 324)

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: An amount of ```fromToken``` to be swapped (The decimal of token must be considered in the amount)

parameters.name: networkCoinPrice
parameters.description: The price of the selected network's coin based on USD. __Example: ```price of BNB = 245.82```__

parameters.name: slippage
parameters.description: A slippage constraint (in %) is a safeguard during swaps. It is used to calculate the minimum possible outcome during estimation.

parameters.name: userAddress
parameters.description: Address of the user who initiates the swap transaction

parameters.name: receiverAddress
parameters.description: Address of the recipient

parameters.name: amountOutMin
parameters.description: The minimum amount out expected from a swap (This amount is available in the estimation result. Also the decimal of token must be considered in the amount)

parameters.name: deadline
parameters.description: Swap estimation will be expired after this deadline (The unit of deadline is based on minutes)

parameters.name: dex
parameters.description: The dex name which will be used for the swap transaction. This value is available in the estimation result as ```swapName```

parameters.name: fromToken
parameters.description: Source token. (Supported values for chainId are 1, 56, 137, 43114, 42161 and 324)

parameters.name: toToken
parameters.description: Destination token. (Supported values for chainId are 1, 56, 137, 43114, 42161 and 324)

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: An amount of ```fromToken``` to be swapped (The decimal of token must be considered in the amount)

parameters.name: networkCoinPrice
parameters.description: The price of the selected network's coin based on USD. __Example: ```price of BNB = 245.82```__

parameters.name: slippage
parameters.description: A slippage constraint (in %) is a safeguard during swaps. It is used to calculate the minimum possible outcome during estimation.

parameters.name: userAddress
parameters.description: Address of the user who initiates the swap transaction

parameters.name: receiverAddress
parameters.description: Address of the recipient

parameters.name: amountOutMin
parameters.description: The minimum amount out expected from a swap (This amount is available in the estimation result. Also the decimal of token must be considered in the amount)

parameters.name: deadline
parameters.description: Swap estimation will be expired after this deadline (The unit of deadline is based on minutes)

parameters.name: amountInFirstSwap
parameters.description: An amount of ```fromToken``` to be swaped (The decimal of token must be considered in the amount)

parameters.name: amountInSecondSwap
parameters.description: An amount of ```fromToken``` to be swaped (The decimal of token must be considered in the amount)

get.summary: This endpoint returns the data for a transaction
get.description:
This endpoint returns ```from```, ```to```, ```data```, ```value```, and ```gasLimit```, all of which needed for executing a swap  
  
* A dex name must be added to the url. The dex name can be found in estimation e.g ```Quickswap```, ```Sushiswap```

parameters.name: poolAddress
parameters.description: Address of pool

parameters.name: userAddress
parameters.description: Address of the user who initiates the swap transaction

parameters.name: fromToken
parameters.description: The token that user choose to invest with. (In investByTokenATokenB, we choose the token that user enter its amount first)

parameters.name: tokenA
parameters.description: The token that user choose to invest with. (In investByTokenATokenB, we choose the token that user enter its amount first)

parameters.name: tokenB
parameters.description: The token that user choose to invest with. (In investByTokenATokenB, we choose the token that user enter its amount first)

parameters.name: amountIn
parameters.description: liquidity amount

parameters.name: deadline
parameters.description: swap estimation will be expired after this deadline (the unit of deadline is based on minutes)

get.summary: This endpoint returns the estimation of a cross-chain swap
get.description: This endpoint finds a route with the potentially best possible outcome for the requested cross-chain pair and returns an estimation.

parameters.name: fromToken
parameters.description: Source token. (Supported values for chainId are 1, 56, 137, 43114, 42161 and 324)

parameters.name: amountIn
parameters.description: An amount of ```fromToken``` to be swapped (The decimal of token must be considered in the amount)

parameters.name: slippage
parameters.description: A slippage constraint (in %) is a safeguard during swaps. It is used to calculate the minimum possible outcome during estimation.

parameters.name: toToken
parameters.description: Destination token. (Supported values for chainId are 1, 56, 137, 43114, 42161 and 324)

parameters.name: userAddress
parameters.description: Address of the user who initiates the cross-chain swap transaction

get.summary: This endpoint returns the status of cross-chain
get.description: This endpoint get the status of cross-chain during its execution.

parameters.name: transactionHash
parameters.description: The transaction hash on the source network

get.summary: This endpoint returns the transaction to cancel a cross-chain swap
get.description: This endpoint returns the transaction to cancel a cross-chain swap

from.description: User address who submits input tokens for a swap
User address who submits input tokens for a swap
